text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump has proven that he doesn't give a damn about Americans who battling COVID-19 or are out work -- he is the champion of the Divided States of America -- and 1st Amendment be damned, Trump will send National Guard and militarized police after anyone who protests against him
